All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Alarm
    Represents an alarm price.
    AlarmsDialog
    Alarms Dialogs can be opened by the user from the menu bar of a chart frame.
    AlarmType
    This enum type is used in the Alarm class to define whether an alarm threshold price is a lower or an upper bound, in order to decide whether it is to be triggered when the stock price crosses from below or from above.
    ApplicationPreferencesModel
    An instance of this class stores the application preferences, the stocks in the watchlist and the opened chart frames.
    BollingerBands
    Represents a Bollinger Bands stock chart indicator.
    Candle
    Represents a stock chart candle.
    CandleDataResponse
    Represents a data provider's response to a request for candle data.
    ChartController
    Represents the controller of a chart window according to the Model-View-Controller paradigm.
    ChartDataStorageForPersistence
    The data of each chart frame that needs to be persisted when the program closes in order to be able to restore the chart frame, is stored in an instance of this class.
    ChartFrame
    Objects of this class are internal frames that house charts chart panels, which in turn draw charts.
    ChartFrameMap
    An instance of this class stores the presently open chart frames in a HashMap.
    ChartFrameMenuBar
    Every chart frame contains an instance of this class as its menu bar.
    ChartModel
    Instances of this class act as the models for the chart views.
    ChartPanel
    Instances of this class are contained in chart frames and form the drawing surfaces for charts and stock data.
    ColorResetTimer
    Instances of this class provide timers to reset price cell color in the watchlist after a specified amount of time.
    CustomDate
    Instances of this class provide custom formated date strings derived from a unix timestamp in milliseconds.
    DataProvider
    Represents a stock data provider (Finnhub, Generator, etc.)
    DataProviderPreferencesPanel
    An instance of this class displays a list of data providers in the preferences dialog and provides buttons to edit the list and individual data providers.
    HttpQueryMaker
    This utility class contains a static method to make a REST http query to the provided URL and receive a String as response.
    IChartViewListener
    This interface contains methods that are called by chart frames in response to user actions.
    Indicator
    The abstract parent class of the indicators.
    IndicatorsDialog
    Represents the dialog that can be opened from the menu bar of a chart frame, where the user defines and creates indicators to be shown in the chart.
    IndicatorTypes
    This enumeration defines constants for the indicator types, which are used to decide how to calculate and render an indicator in a chart.
    Intervals
    The constants in this enumeration identify a chart interval.
    IPreferencesPersistence
    The Interface IPreferencesPersistence.
    IStockFinder
    Implementing classes provide a method that a search term as a string, query a data provider and return an array of stocks that match the search.
    IWatchlistModel
    This interface specifies capabilities a watchlist model needs to have.
    IWebSocketListener
    This interface specifies capabilities a class needs to have in order to be registered with a web socket client to be informed of and process incoming trade messages from the data provider.
    MainController
    An instance of this class controls the interactions between the major program components: preferences, watchlist and charts.
    MainFrame
    Represents the main frame of the application.
    MainMenuBar
    Represents the menu bar of the main application frame.
    MovingAverage
    Instances of this class store data for calculating Moving Average type indicators.
    PreferencesController
    An instance of this class acts as a controller between a application preferences model and view.
    PreferencesDialog
    An instance of class functions as the view for the application preferences.
    PreferencesPersistenceWithJSON
    An instance of this class handles storing application preferences in a persistent configuration file on disk.
    PriceChangeDirection
    The constants in this enumeration serve to define whether a stock is falling, rising or staying constant in price.
    PriceColorRenderer
    An instance of this renderer handles the coloration of the price cells in the watchlist table in response to changing stock prices.
    StaticCandleDataRequester
    This class contains a static method for requesting candle data from a data provider.
    StaticStockQuoteRequester
    This utility class provides a static method to get a stock quote from the specified data provider.
    Stock
    Represents a stock.
    StockDataWebSocketClient
    This class implements a web socket client, which connects to a data provider in order to receive push messages when new trade occur.
    Stocker_3297810_Hofmann_Jan  
    StockerTest_3297810_Hofmann_Jan  
    StockerTesterImpl  
    StockFinder
    This class implements the IStockFinder interface.
    StockFinderDialog
    This class represents a visual interface to the user to find stocks by entering search terms.
    TooManyIntervalsException
    Exceptions of this type are thrown by the chart model when the user requests more data points than the data provider provides.
    TradeMessage
    Trade messages in json format received through a websocket connection get deserialized into instances of this class.
    TradeMessage.Data
    Each individual trade is represented by an instance of this class.
    WatchlistFrame
    An instance of this internal frame holds the watchlist and buttons to add and remove stocks, as well as to show a chart for the selected stock.
    WatchlistModel
    An instance of this class functions as the watchlist's data model.
    WebSocketClientWrapper
    An instance of this class is used to interface the actual web socket client (an instance of StockDataWebSocketClient) with the rest of the program.
    WindowsMenuChartItem
    Represents an item in the Windows menu of the main frame menu bar.
